\ww		opens the main vimwiki
\ws		choose vimwiki space
\w\w		open diary of the day
\w\t		open diary of the day in new split
shift+enter	enter <br />
=/-		increase/decrease title level
:Vimwikitable 	create a table
\wd		delete a wiki file 
\wr		rename a wiki file
ALT + <ArrowR>	move a coloum to right 
:VimwikiAll2HTML	create html from wiki
